entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -24.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -24.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -27.1°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
